summary: A beautiful young girl, unfortunately possessed from her childhood by a vengeful spirit, wanders around lonely places to seduce and kill people and thus, gradually becoming lost into a dark world of revenge and lust.
cast: Jasmin|Hemant Birje|Sahila Chaddha|Kulbhushan Kharbanda|Satish Shah|Rajesh Vivek|Roy Kamal|Vijayendra Ghatge|Gulshan Grover|Narendra Nath|Vijay Arora|Rajendra Nath|Rama Vij|Tina Ghai|Baby Swati|Pradeep Chaudhry|Prakash|Leela Mishra|Bhushan Tiwari|Gorilla|Shamsuddin|Baby Sneha|Ajay Chadha|Chhote Ustad|Vaishnavi Mahant|Kedarnath Saigal
title: Veerana
